Class IRCChannel

java.lang.Object

                    +--com.milk.uberchat.irc.IRCChannel
All Implemented Interfaces:
ChatChannel, ChatEntity, ChatLocus, Commandable
public class IRCChannel
extends BaseChannel

This is the ChatChannel class for IRC channels.

Author:
Dan Bornstein, danfuzz@milk.com
, Copyright 1998-1999 Dan Bornstein, all rights reserved.

channelJoin

protected final void channelJoin()
BaseChannel calls this method when it actually wants to try to do a channel join. It will only call this if the channel has not in fact already been joined.

Specified by:
channelJoin in class BaseChannel

channelLeave

protected final void channelLeave()
BaseChannel calls this method when it actually wants to try to do a channel leave. It will only call this if the channel is in fact currently joined.

Specified by:
channelLeave in class BaseChannel

callBroadcast

void callBroadcast(BaseEvent ev)
